<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>This fix script is used to handle the updates for the CSP Portal VA URL redirect properties into new table sys_cs_portal_url_mapping for Publications</description> <name>Update Publication Redirect Prop CSP</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var includeList = ['b730647b3b2123009cbbcea234efc479'];
new CSUrlRedirectUtils().updateBUPortalProperties(includeList);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-04-21 06:38:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b3a15cdb05a72010f877fbf8971bde8b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update Publication Redirect Prop CSP</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Consumer Service Portal Classic" source="com.glide.service-portal.consumer-portal">3a6bd6bb4722c210cd4e1ce4316d436b</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b3a15cdb05a72010f877fbf8971bde8b</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-04-21 06:38:02</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
